results.name: Stench
results.url: This Pokémon's damaging moves have a 10% chance to make the target flinch with each hit if they do not already cause flinching as a secondary effect

results.name: Drizzle
results.url: The weather changes to rain when this Pokémon enters battle and does not end unless replaced by another weather condition.

results.name: Speed-boost
results.url: This Pokémon's Speed rises one stage after each turn.

results.name: Battle-armor
results.url: Moves cannot score critical hits against this Pokémon

results.name: Sturdy
results.url: Does not prevent regular KOs from full HP.

results.name: Damp
results.url: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.

results.name: Limber
results.url:
This Pokémon cannot be paralyzed.

If a Pokémon is paralyzed and acquires this ability, its paralysis is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.

results.name: Static
results.url: Has no overworld effect.

results.name: Volt-absorb
results.url: Does not absorb non-damaging electric moves, i.e. thunder wave.

results.name: Water-absorb
results.url:
Whenever a water-type move hits this Pokémon, it heals for 1/4 of its maximum HP, negating any other effect on it.

Water moves will ignore this Pokémon's substitute.

results.name: Oblivious
results.url:
This Pokémon cannot be infatuated and is immune to captivate.

If a Pokémon is infatuated and acquires this ability, its infatuation is cleared.

results.name: Cloud-nine
results.url:
While this Pokémon is in battle, weather can still be in play, but will not have any of its effects.

This ability functions identically to air lock.

results.name: Compound-eyes
results.url: Has no overworld effect.

results.name: Insomnia
results.url: This Pokémon cannot be asleep.

results.name: Color-change
results.url: Triggers on every hit of multiple-hit moves.

results.name: Immunity
results.url: This Pokémon cannot be poisoned.

results.name: Flash-fire
results.url: will o wisp does not trigger this ability for Pokémon immune to burns.

results.name: Shield-dust
results.url: This Pokémon is immune to the extra effects of moves used against it.

results.name: Own-tempo
results.url: This Pokémon cannot be confused.

results.name: Suction-cups
results.url: Has no overworld effect.

results.name: Intimidate
results.url: Has no overworld effect.

results.name: Shadow-tag
results.url: Affects other Pokémon with this ability.

results.name: Rough-skin
results.url: Inflicts only 1/16 of the attacker's maximum HP in damage.

results.name: Wonder-guard
results.url: fire fang and moves that inflict typeless damage ignore this ability regardless of type.

results.name: Levitate
results.url:
This Pokémon is immune to ground-type moves, spikes, toxic spikes, and arena trap.

This ability is disabled during gravity or ingrain, or while holding an iron ball.

results.name: Effect-spore
results.url: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being paralyzed, poisoned, or put to sleep, chosen at random.

results.name: Synchronize
results.url: Has no overworld effect.

results.name: Clear-body
results.url: This Pokémon cannot have its stats lowered by other Pokémon.

results.name: Natural-cure
results.url: This Pokémon is cured of any major status ailment when it is switched out for another Pokémon.

results.name: Lightning-rod
results.url: Has no overworld effect.

results.name: Serene-grace
results.url: This Pokémon's moves have twice their usual effect chance.

results.name: Swift-swim
results.url: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during rain.

results.name: Chlorophyll
results.url: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during strong sunlight.

results.name: Illuminate
results.url: Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is doubled.

results.name: Trace
results.url: Can copy flower gift and wonder guard.

results.name: Huge-power
results.url: This Pokémon's Attack is doubled while in battle.

results.name: Poison-point
results.url: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being poisoned.

results.name: Inner-focus
results.url: This Pokémon cannot flinch.

results.name: Magma-armor
results.url: Has no overworld effect.
